posts.post_content:
Posting some more raw, low grade Hall of Fame T206 cards for sale.  Also lowered prices on ones not sold in my previous post, and condensing them here.  

Open to offers, especially if purchasing multiple cards. "I'll take it" takes precedence over any ongoing negotiations.

Add $5 for shipping. Free shipping on purchases of multiple cards. ppff or check/money order accepted. Scans are available on my website,

[url]https://www.t206miscut.com/cards-for-sale[/url]



Rube Marquard - Polar Bear (Pitching) - SOLD
Fred Clarke - Piedmont (Pittsburgh, Holding Bat) - SOLD
Chief Bender - Sovereign (Pitching, Trees in Background) - [STRIKE]$100[/STRIKE] $85

I'll take Griffith
